# all

**Type Property**

All customization behaviors.

## Declaration

```swift
static var all: TableColumnCustomizationBehavior { get }
```

## Getting the customization behavior

- **reorder**: A behavior that allows the column to be reordered by the user.
- **resize**: A behavior that allows the column to be resized by the user.
- **visibility**: A behavior that allows the column to be hidden or revealed by the user.

items.description: A behavior that allows the column to be reordered by the user.
items.name: reorder

items.description: A behavior that allows the column to be resized by the user.
items.name: resize

items.description: A behavior that allows the column to be hidden or revealed by the user.
items.name: visibility
